content: The Sandbox environments have been updated yesterday 7.9.2017 (bugs have been fixed). Also Instructions for Sandbox environments and Development process of the national data content has been recently updated. See http://www.kanta.fi/fi/web/ammattilaisille/omakannan-omatietovaranto.

Here http://www.kanta.fi/en/web/ammattilaisille/tarkeaa-tietoa-kehittajille you can find instructions how to Create a Patient resource at the sandbox environment without an authorization functionality. Also THL Jira Instructions has been updated .
How does one get access to THL Jira?
Nevermind, found the instructions at http://www.kanta.fi/documents/12105/4106842/THL+Jira-tool+instructions+for+PHR+Development/63164096-da07-4b5d-bbfc-5691e889ad5c
Hi, information about Kanta PHR at www.kanta.fi/phr has been updated and you can now find instructions for how to integrate an application with Kanta PHR.

Hi,
Would it be possible for you to provide link(s) to the new contents in the news notifications whenever the notification concerns such a topic in the future? E.g. in this newest notification, it would be link to http://www.kanta.fi/web/ammattilaisille/sovelluksen-liittaminen-omatietovarantoon. That would be helpful for finding the updated content.
Hi @Esko Niinimäki , yes we try to do so in the future!
The PHR authorisation guide has been updated: http://www.kanta.fi/documents/12105/4106842/PHR+authorization/b2135f9f-5bfb-49d8-827e-4f5b44cdab2e

Hi, next Tuesday 20.3.2018 12:30-15:00 is again (once in a month) FL7 Finland PH SIG Kanta PHR support meeting, agenda: http://www.hl7.fi/wp-content/uploads/HL7-20180320-OTV-skk-nro-3.pdf

In these meetings, you can get advices about how to use HL7 FHIR based Kanta PHR national data content in your integration / application. In addition, proposals for changing or expanding the current Kanta PHR data content are discussed and reviewed. Anyone interested in Kanta PHR / FHIR / Personal health can participate in these meetings. The language in meetings is Finnish, but we are ready to change to English if needed.

More information (in Finnish): http://www.hl7.fi/sig-toiminta/personal-health-sig/omatietovarannon-tukiprojekti/.

You are welcome to join the meeting and comment for example what kind of training you will need related to Kanta PHR!

The Development process of the Kanta PHR's national data content has been updated: http://www.kanta.fi/en/web/ammattilaisille/tietosisallon-kehittaminen. We have made the process more fluent and that’s why a new proposal form has been published: http://www.kanta.fi/documents/12105/4106842/Kanta+PHR+Data+Content+Proposal+form/f8df411f-ef64-489d-bda8-c3f643f2cb88

Tuesday 17.4.2018 12:30-15:00 is HL7 Finland PH SIG Kanta PHR support meeting. Eeva Turkka teaches how to use Kanta PHR Sandbox-environments and Anna Korpela advices how to use Simplifier.net. In addition, proposals for changing or expanding the current Kanta PHR data content are discussed and reviewed. More information (in Finnish): http://www.hl7.fi/sig-toiminta/personal-health-sig/omatietovarannon-tukiprojekti/. Welcome!

Tuesday 15.5.2018 12:30-15:00 is HL7 Finland PH SIG Kanta PHR support meeting. Eeva Turkka continues to advice how to use Kanta PHR Sandbox-environments and tells about Oauth 2.0 authorization. In addition, proposals for changing or expanding the current Kanta PHR data content are discussed and reviewed. More information (in Finnish): http://www.hl7.fi/sig-toiminta/personal-health-sig/omatietovarannon-tukiprojekti/. Welcome!
Is it possible to watch a recording of the support meeting? Or better still, a separate clip from the advices? Those advices are in danger of largerly going wasted if people can't see them anymore.
Hi, we have already thought the same :-). So, short advising video-clips are coming after summer -I can't tell the exact time yet, because it needs some preparations!
Thank you!

Hi, Tuesday 11.9.2018 12:30-15:00 is HL7 Finland PH SIG Kanta PHR support meeting where proposals for changing or expanding the current Kanta PHR data content. Our pilot-customers developer tells you his experiences about making integration to Kanta PHR. More information (in Finnish): http://www.hl7.fi/sig-toiminta/personal-health-sig/omatietovarannon-tukiprojekti/. Describe your development proposal 2 weeks earlier (28.8.2018) using proposal form (you can find it here: https://www.kanta.fi/system-developers/development-of-the-national-data-content and send it to kantakehitys@kanta.fi and jorma.jalkanen@csamhealth.com.
Kanta PHR Sandbox and approval test environments are under construction from 6.9.2018 8:00 till 7.9.2018 8:00 and the services are not available that time.
There might be momentary short breaks in Kanta PHR sandbox and approval test environments from 25.9.2018 8:00 to 27.9.2018 15:00 due to maintenance work.

Hi, the agenda for the next HL7 Finland PH SIG Kanta PHR support meeting at Tuesday 9.10.2018 12:30-15:00 has been published: http://www.hl7.fi/wp-content/uploads/HL7-20181009-OTV-sk-kokous-nro-8-agenda.pdf. There is many proposals for expanding the current Kanta PHR data content. We also tell about Kanta PHR implementation guide. Come and take part in the discussion! You can get Skype-invitation to meeting from jorma.jalkanen@csamhealth.com.

The Kanta PHR Sandbox environments will be updated at 8.10.2018 to new versions that include the most recent versions of Kanta PHR profiles, new dependency library versions (including HAPI), paging for the results of a search (https://www.hl7.org/fhir/http.html#paging) and some bug fixes. Sandbox environments are still using HL7 FHIR STU3 version. During the updating, the service is not available.

Hi, new proposals for expanding the current Kanta PHR data content are discussed and reviewed at the next HL7 Finland PH SIG Kanta PHR support meeting at Tuesday 6.11.2018 12:30-15:00. The agenda is here: http://www.hl7.fi/wp-content/uploads/HL7-20181106-OTV-sk-kokous-nro-9-agenda.pdf. We also tell about Kanta PHR profiling and best practices when making integration to Kanta PHR. Come and take part in the discussion! You can get Skype-invitation to meeting from jorma.jalkanen@csamhealth.com.

Hi, hope you all have noticed this change to make pitch of your idea at 5.12.2018: https://stm.fi/tapahtumat/2018-12-05/slush-2018-official-side-event-moving-on-up-partner-with-public-sector-for-growth-in-health-.
You can find the link to application form from this site: https://valtioneuvosto.fi/artikkeli/-/asset_publisher/1271139/stm-palkitsi-kolme-hyvinvointisovellusten-kehittajaa?fbclid=IwAR1t2D8RkZi0gq4LOJVdf3R0qDfxx5981in14MrpnvHTKwG5yekSiaIPexM and the deadline for applications is 4.11.2018!
Is there more information available about the 3 winner application?
Hi Esko, I'm sorry, but in Kela we do not have more information about the winners.

Hi, this year’s last HL7 Finland PH SIG Kanta PHR support meeting is at Tuesday 4.12.2018 12:30-15:00 (Skype).

You can send proposals for expanding the current Kanta PHR data content via this form: https://www.kanta.fi/documents/20143/91486/Kanta+PHR+Data+Content+Proposal+form.xlsx/2ce1efc9-0205-c9a8-d27e-66deb3440150. Send the form to kantakehitys@kanta.fi and jorma.jalkanen@csamhealth.com no later than 20.11.2018!

You can get Skype-invitation to meeting from jorma.jalkanen@csamhealth.com.

The agenda for the next HL7 Finland PH SIG Kanta PHR support meeting at Tuesday 4.12.2018 12:30-15:00 has been published: http://www.hl7.fi/wp-content/uploads/HL7-20181204-OTV-sk-kokous-nro-10-agenda.pdf. Come and take part in the discussion! You can get Skype-invitation to meeting from jorma.jalkanen@csamhealth.com.
The Kanta PHR Sandbox environments will be updated on Tuesday 22.1.2019. More information about the update will be provided on Monday 21.1.2019.

The Kanta PHR Sandbox environments will be updated at 22.1.2019 12:00-14:00 to new versions that include the most recent versions of Kanta PHR profiles and data content (see https://simplifier.net/FinnishPHR), new HAPI dependency library version 3.6.0, changes to authorization UI and some bug fixes. All Kanta PHR environments are using HL7 FHIR STU3 version.

Hi, Wednesday 13.2.2019 12:30-15:00 is HL7 Finland PH SIG Kanta PHR support meeting where proposals for changing or expanding the current Kanta PHR data content. Describe your development proposal two weeks earlier (by 30.1.2019) using proposal form (you can find it here: https://www.kanta.fi/system-developers/development-of-the-national-data-content) and send it to kantakehitys@kanta.fi and janne.aaltonen@csamhealth.com. More information (in Finnish): http://www.hl7.fi/sig-toiminta/personal-health-sig/omatietovarannon-tukiprojekti/.

Dear all,
We (Sensotrend) just submitted two change proposals for Finnish PHR content.
For MedicationAdministration see the document at https://docs.google.com/document/d/1byQiomXaP4jjx04M08TCKsi3saEtih76JAPe6ye57AU
For blood glucose observations see https://docs.google.com/document/d/1AqmGQmDXwmD1v_kcAYchKqigufK3RSANOS7sxE-5C_Y
We're happy to discuss the proposals even before the next meeting.

@Anssi Hämäläinen the dates announced at http://www.hl7.fi/sig-toiminta/personal-health-sig/omatietovarannon-tukiprojekti/ seem to have some typos.
March meeting is on 13. 2. 2019
June meeting is on Wed 10.6.2019, which does not exist.
August meeting is on 28. 6. 2019
October meeting is on 16. 5. 2019
Thank you for your info. The dates are correct now.

The Kanta PHR Sandbox environments will be updated at 7.2.2019 13:00-14:00 to new versions that include the most recent versions of Kanta PHR profiles and data content (see https://simplifier.net/FinnishPHR). There might be short breaks during the update work.

Hi, Wednesday 13.3.2019 12:30-15:00 is HL7 Finland PH SIG Kanta PHR support meeting where proposals for changing or expanding the current Kanta PHR data content. Describe your development proposal two weeks earlier (by 27.2.2019) using proposal form (you can find it here: https://www.kanta.fi/system-developers/development-of-the-national-data-content) and send it to kantakehitys@kanta.fi and janne.aaltonen@csamhealth.com. More information (in Finnish): http://www.hl7.fi/sig-toiminta/personal-health-sig/omatietovarannon-tukiprojekti/.

Hello, Wednesday 10.4.2019 12:30-15:00 is the next HL7 Finland PH SIG Kanta PHR support meeting where proposals for changing or expanding the current Kanta PHR data content.

Describe your development proposal two weeks earlier (by 29.3.2019) using proposal form (you can find it here: https://www.kanta.fi/system-developers/development-of-the-national-data-content) and send it to kantakehitys@kanta.fi and janne.aaltonen@csamhealth.com.

More information (in Finnish): http://www.hl7.fi/sig-toiminta/personal-health-sig/omatietovarannon-tukiprojekti/.

Hi, Wednesday 15.5.2019 12:30-15:00 is the next HL7 Finland PH SIG Kanta PHR support meeting where proposals for changing or expanding the current Kanta PHR data content.

Describe your development proposal two weeks earlier (by 1.5.2019) using proposal form (you can find it here: https://www.kanta.fi/system-developers/development-of-the-national-data-content) and send it to kantakehitys@kanta.fi and janne.aaltonen@csamhealth.com.

More information (in Finnish): http://www.hl7.fi/sig-toiminta/personal-health-sig/omatietovarannon-tukiprojekti/.
Hi, It might take longer than usual to reply your chat messages, questions and e-mails sent to kantakehitys@kanta.fi address during summer. Have a nice summer everyone!

Hi, Wednesday 18.9.2019 12:30-15:00 is the next HL7 Finland PH SIG Kanta PHR support meeting where proposals for changing or expanding the current Kanta PHR data content. The planned support meeting 28.8.2019 has been canceled.

Describe your development proposal two weeks earlier (by 3.9.2019) using proposal form (you can find it here: https://www.kanta.fi/system-developers/development-of-the-national-data-content) and send it to kantakehitys@kanta.fi and janne.aaltonen@csamhealth.com.
More information (in Finnish): http://www.hl7.fi/sig-toiminta/personal-health-sig/omatietovarannon-tukiprojekti/.

Hi, Wednesday 16.10.2019 12:30-15:00 is the next HL7 Finland PH SIG Kanta PHR support meeting where proposals for changing or expanding the current Kanta PHR data content.

Describe your development proposal two weeks earlier (by 2.10.2019) using proposal form (you can find it here: https://www.kanta.fi/system-developers/development-of-the-national-data-content) and send it to kantakehitys@kanta.fi and janne.aaltonen@csamhealth.com.

More information (in Finnish): http://www.hl7.fi/sig-toiminta/personal-health-sig/omatietovarannon-tukiprojekti/.

On Wednesday 13.5.2020 13:00-15:00 is the next HL7 Finland PH SIG Kanta PHR support meeting where proposals for changing or expanding the current Kanta PHR data content.

More information (in Finnish): http://www.hl7.fi/sig-toiminta/personal-health-sig/omatietovarannon-tukiprojekti/.

Support for HL7 FHIR R4 standard version will be implemented in the Kanta PHR platform next to the existing support of STU3. Read more about the plan: https://kafi-hallinta.kanta.fi/documents/20143/91486/Kanta+PHR%2C+the+plan+for+supporting+both+HL7+FHIR+R4+and+STU3.pdf/53901b8a-3310-8450-2213-d4a0256b2c47 . Comments on the plan can be sent to kantakehitys@kanta.fi.

Due to the delay in the progress of the Client Data Act and the related financing decisions, the development of the data content of Kanta PHR has been temporarily suspended. The development will be continued as soon as it is possible. More information on the development of the national data content can be found on the Kanta website, at https://www.kanta.fi/jarjestelmakehittajat/tietosisallon-kehittaminen.
